org.wonderly.awt
Class DynamicAWTEventSourceContextMap

java.lang.Object
  org.wonderly.awt.DynamicAWTEventSourceContextMap
All Implemented Interfaces:
ThreadContextMap
public class DynamicAWTEventSourceContextMap
extends Object
implements ThreadContextMap

This class provides a dymamic implementation of ThreadContextMap. This implementation allows the application to draw on the values in the AWTEvent source field to use particular Subject and ClassLoader values. This mechanism is exploitable by errant code which lies in the source field about the source of the event.

Author:
Gregg Wonderly.
See Also:
SecureEventQueue
